Also Wednesday, Scotland Yard, which some have criticized for what they called a lax investigation, said it would reopen its own inquiries, saying it had received significant new information relating to allegations of phone hacking at The News of the World in 2005/06. The Crown PSienna Millercution Service also recently said it would expand its review of evidence gathered by the police to include any`` recent or new substantive allegations.'' NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
